Title: Still Life
Director: Houshang Baharlou, Morteza Momayyez, Sohrab Shahid Saless
Actors: Zadour Bonyadi, Mohammed Kani, Hibibollah Safarian, Habib Safaryan
Plot: For more than three decades, aging Iranian Mohamad Sardari (Zadour Bonyadi) has worked as a crossing guard at a desolate train station. Through the years, Mohamad has done little to stifle ...
